SECONDARY.name: Namae o Yonde wa Ikenai Ano Doubutsu

description:
The zany and cute-but-crude Wooser returns for another season in Wooser`s Hand-to-Mouth Life: Phantasmagoric Arc! Voiced by the prolific and hugely popular voice actor Mamoru Miyano, Wooser is a creature that only cares about three things in life: meat, money, and girls.
Source: crunchyroll

REGULAR.description:
This is the tale of an unknown hero.  Once day, Wooser leaves for deep space, risking his life to protect the things he loves. ... Probably the things he loves are money, meat, and girls.  Also uniforms.  But there are those who love him anyway: Rin, and Ren.  When the wish they made on a starry sky is heard, a miracle will occur in a distant galaxy!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Wooser`s Hand to Mouth Life Is Back Again
Wooser`s Hand to Mouth Life Is Back Again
wooser`s hand to mouth life is back again

REGULAR.description:
Yesterday, tomorrow, and likely for the rest of time, Wooser just sits and consumes instead of working.  Darth Wooser almost calls him a NEET, but is stopped by the self-destruct circuits that will destroy him if he insults his master.  To make things worse, Wooser actively tries to get him to self-destruct.  What will be the fate of Darth Wooser?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sakushi Wooser, Sono Hiretsu Naru Bouryaku
Wooser the Strategist and His Cunning Plan
策士うーさー, その卑劣なる謀略

REGULAR.description:
It hurts... it hurts so much...  Wooser is in great pain staring at a blank white sheet of paper.  His deadline is coming but he`s too hung over to think of anything.  He wasn`t just being lazy, though, he was drinking all night with the sponsers to keep from running out of money.  WIll Wooser be able to overcome the evil within himself and meet his deadline?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Wooser-sensei, Shimekiri to no Tatakai
Wooser-sensei`s Battle with Deadlines
うーさー先生, 締め切りとの戦い

REGULAR.description:
You can never remember what exactly goes on in an episode of Wooser, can you?  But did you know this is actually the 88,888th broadcast of this episode?  Is everything a dream?  Can Wooser overcome Nietzsche`s Eternal Recurrence, and defeat Diogenes in his attempt to live an austere life?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Professor Wooser Says, "Everything Becomes J/K"
Wooser-kyouju Iwaku, Subete wa J/K ni Naru
うーさー教授曰く, すべてはJ/Kになる

REGULAR.description:
If having two people makes the work go twice as fast, having fifty three people will make it go fifty three times as fast! Wooser splits himself into 53 Woosers and forms an idol group, Wooser53.  With Miss Monochrome`s help, they go big.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Wooser 53, Watashi Idol ni Narimasu
Wooser53, I`m Going to Be an Idol
うーさ53. 私アイドルになります

REGULAR.description:
To fund his elegant lifestyle of never leaving the house, Wooser decides to enter a one million yen movie contest.  But he knows nothing about making movies, and has nothing but crazy ideas.  Just when the project is about to fall apart, a certain famous movie actress agrees to help.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Director Wooser and the Twilight Age of Movie Madness
Wooser-kantoku, Tasogare no Eiga-kyou Jidai
うーさー監督, 黄昏の映画狂時代

REGULAR.description:
Wooser plays a game where one player is the werewolf, and the others are villagers trying to find him.  The game is popular with middle school and high school girls, which is why Wooser likes it. He`s a villager, so will he be able to find the wolf in time?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Murabito Wooser, Sono Kemono no Honshou
The Villager Wooser and His True Bestial Nature
村人うーさー, その獣の本性

REGULAR.description:
Wooser is turned into a grasshopper and smashes up the city again.  Rin and Len must transform into magical girls to stop him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Daydreaming Wooser Transforms Once More
Hakuchuumu Wooser no Henshin Futatabi
白昼夢うーさーの変身ふたたび

REGULAR.description:
Wooser and the gang are trapped in coffins on a beach next to a sea of blood. They seem oblivious to this.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Aoi Umi Shiroi Sunahama, Kuroi Wooser
Blue Seas, White Sand, Black Wooser
青い海白い砂浜, 黒いうーさー

REGULAR.description:
Wooser loves his uniforms, and he loves his uniform doujinshi.  He loves them so much that he`ll brave the sweltering heat, freezing cold, and massive crowds to get them.  But there is one final test he must past... the mysterious masked swordsman!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hunter Wooser and the Law of the Festival
Hunter Wooser, Matsuri no Okite
ハンターうーさー, 祭りの掟

REGULAR.description:
Detective Wooser solves the crime of the century.  Ajipon has been murdered, and it`s up to Wooser to find the killer.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Detective Wooser`s Final Problem
Meitantei Wooser, Saigo no Jiken
名探偵うーさー, 最後の事件

REGULAR.description:
Wooser becomes omnipotent. His powers know no bounds, changing the weather, changing even the laws of nature and finally even consuming the world.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Wooser no Yasashii Sekai
Wooser`s Kind World
うーさーの優しい世界

REGULAR.description:
With a piece of ice hidden in a snowball, a snow fight turns murderous.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Wooser`s Hand to Mouth Life a Dream Play...
Wooser`s Hand to Mouth Life a Dream Play...
wooser`s hand to mouth life a dream play...

WIKIPEDIA_JP: うーさーのその日暮らし

titles.title: Wooser no Sono Higurashi: Mugen Hen
Wooser`s Hand-to-Mouth Life: Phantasmagoric Arc
うーさーのその日暮らし 夢幻編
兔宝的悲惨日常 梦幻篇
Project Wooser 3
